subtitle.bachata: From basic to intermediate and advanced, with video examples.
desc.bachata.basic.lateral: Side step with tap; relaxed torso and comfortable connection.
desc.bachata.basic.forwardback: Forward‑back with tap; keep axis and smooth weight transfer.
desc.bachata.basic.inplace: 3 steps + tap in place; great for weight control and timing.
desc.bachata.box: Box‑shaped pattern; short steps and a stable frame.
desc.bachata.turn: Soft prep, clear signal and stable axis.
desc.bachata.hands: Open/closed holds and hand changes; basis for sombrero and pasadas.
desc.bachata.wrap: Wrap/unwrap with clear, comfortable hand paths.
desc.bachata.cbl: Cross‑body style entry/exit; control facing and path.
desc.bachata.shines.basic: Heel‑toe, V‑step and Suzy Q with soft accents.
tech.bachata.basic: Tap without stomping; short steps, clear weight.
err.bachata.basic: Mixing step and tap; steps too wide.
tech.bachata.turn: Anticipate from your core; keep a light hand.
tech.bachata.lateral: Lead with body weight; avoid bouncing on the tap.
desc.bachata.onda: Chest → abs → hips → knees; dissociation and control.
desc.bachata.ochos: Figure 8 (∞) hips/torso integrated in side basic or in place.
desc.bachata.shadow: Enter shadow position; parallel lines; exits to wrap or free spin.
tech.bachata.onda: Breathing and downward sequence; manage amplitude.
err.bachata.onda: Only hips; no return to neutral.
err.bachata.ochos: Timing loss due to amplitude; lifted shoulders.
tip.bachata.ochos: Practice against a wall for axis control.
desc.bachata.footwork: Syncopations, weight control, accents and cuts.
desc.bachata.fusion: Blend waves and turns with Dominican patterns; smooth transitions.
desc.bachata.dip: Safe dip with pelvic/back support and a clear preparation.
tech.bachata.footwork: Build 8‑count blocks and add accents later.
err.bachata.footwork: Tap instead of step; losing the 1 when reconnecting.
tech.bachata.fusion: Controlled frame; breathe the wave before turning.
err.bachata.fusion: Style mixing with no musical logic; forgetting to reconnect.
tip.bachata.fusion: Define a theme: waves on A, Dominican on B.
variations.title: Variations
desc.wrap.turnexit: After the wrap, add an inside turn and release to a side step.
tech.wrap.turnexit: Guide rotation from your core with a relaxed wrist.
err.wrap.turnexit: Too much force on the release.
desc.wrap.shoulder: Comfortable release over the partner’s shoulder at mid height.
tech.wrap.shoulder: Correct height and relaxed wrist; avoid awkward angles.
err.wrap.shoulder: Tense crosses due to bad height.
desc.wave.lateral: Wave shifting the center laterally; keep amplitude controlled.
desc.wave.inverted: Ascending sequence (hips → abs → chest); gentle lead.
desc.ochos.bothhands: Extra control from both hands; avoid blocking shoulders.
desc.ochos.intowrap: Connect figure‑8 with a wrap; cue the transition on 7‑8.
desc.double.handchange: Chain the second turn with a clean hand change at proper height.
desc.double.sync: Both spin together; keep elastic frame and vertical axis.
desc.tornado360: Continuous turn with speed control and a defined exit.
desc.counterturn.handchange: Reverse direction after the first turn; avoid arm pulling.
desc.combo.shadowwrap360dip: Linked sequence combining positions and couple dynamics.
